sub_title: DevOps Engineer. CICD, Azure DevOps, Oracle DBA, Ansible, Python, Docker, Kubernetes, RPA(Uipath), ITIL, IT Risk,Cloud (AWS, Azure), Anvil & ARC suits.
summary: Experienced DevOps Engineer with demonstrated history of working in banking and Financial services. Skilled in Linux & Windows admin, ION products like ANVIL & ARC, Oracle DBA, Public & Private cloud(Azure, AWA) ,Azure DevOps, CI CD, Ansible, Docker, Kubernetes ,Python Programing. Highly skilled Engineering professional with Bachelors Degree focused on Electrical and Electronics.

projects.title: Global Namescreening @ Rabo Bank
projects.description:
Rabobank is a Dutch multinational banking and financial services company headquartered in Utrecht, Netherlands.Food and agribusiness constitute the primary international focus of the Rabobank Group.Rabobank is the second-largest bank in the Netherlands in terms of total assets.
 
Foundation for Global NameScreening(GNS) is to establish the foundation for effective Name Screening by a state-of the art NameScreening(NS) Model and a smooth NS experience by a global way of working for our customers. GNS Provide a robust and future proof Name Screening solution for Rabobank Group (Retail NL, Wholesale & Rural, and main subsidiaries) to protect our society, customers, and bank.

projects.title: British Telecom
projects.description: BT is a largest telecom firm in UK.The project is very critical as it handles live transactions of the entire UK.The project is so critical that the downtime would cost the more loss.

contributors.headline: DevOps Engineer. CICD, Azure DevOps, Oracle DBA, Ansible, Python, Docker, Kubernetes, RPA(Uipath), ITIL, IT Risk,Cloud (AWS, Azure), Anvil & ARC suits.

profile_positions.description:
• Automating and Integrating the Global Name Screening SAAS application in Rabobank environments.
• Automate the application deployment in Azure DevOps. 
• Automate the deployment of Azure services from ARM template using Azure pipeline.
• Create the Azure Data Factory for orchestrating and managing the data from various sources for
entire Rabo customers.
• Create and Configure Azure Functions(Python) for facilitating the SAAS integration with the name
screening application
• Create and maintain the Azure Storage accounts for processing the name screening data’s.
• Configure Application insight for logging and configure the alerts.
• Power BI configuration for report analysis and generating graphs.  
• Integrate various azure services for file handling and processing them.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer @ Rabo Bank NL

profile_positions.description:
* Administrate the RHEL6,7and windows server.
* Support ION products like ANVIL and ARC.
* Takes care of Life Cycle Management of the software's on srver & reducing the operational risk(IT Risk) of the servers.
* Scan the servers for Vulnerability and provide the fixes. Manage certificates in keystores. 
* Maintenance and Deployment of applications like java sprintboot, Oracle webserver,SOA, ESB, and ION - ANVIL and ARC.
* Good understanding of the network topologies like DNS and ports. Installs and maintains tomcat and apache webservers.
* Created the pipeline starting for DTAP environment using CI/CD tools like Git, Jenkins, Sonarqube, Fortify and Artifactory
* Create a playbook and Roles using ansible for the deployment pipeline and deploy using Nolio and TFS.
* Migrate the repositories from git to Azure repo and create the build & release pipelines.
* Migration of the legacy application from VDC servers to private cloud(AWS). Create the new machine, prepare them for application usage and deployment of application using Azure pipeline.
* Migration of application from VDC server to Docker containers and Orchestrate them using Kubernetes. 
* Preparing and configuring the monitoring tools like graphite, Grafana and elastic search.
* Core DBA activities include backup and restore for oracle 11g and 12c databases and performance tuning of the database. Database migration from 11g to 12C and DBaaS. Good handson with Oracle Enterprise Manager.
* Responsible for entire ITIL process such as incident management, change management & Problem management.
* Automate the repetitive and time consuming task using shell or Python. Experience in python coding and flask
* Perform the data analysis using pandas, numpy, seaborn etc.
* Scrum master of the squad and responsible for the scrum activities like standup, refinement, retrospective and sprint review.
* Understand the Robotic process automation and automated the various tasks using Uipath.
profile_positions.title: DevOps Engineer
